data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Surt will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Surt, Libya
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Surt, Libya.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,490 believers in Surt and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Surt. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Berber, Jalo people might believe through him.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Surt, Libya today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Surt, Libya.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 1,490 believers find a person of peace today among the 939,210 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
